title: Admin SEO visibility stats and sitemap pinging
scope: Add backend SEO monitoring service for Google Search Console sitemap stats
Expose an admin endpoint that returns indexing/coverage summary for the dashboard
Ping Google sitemap endpoint on blog publish and surface ping status
Show SEO visibility stats in the admin overview UI
acceptance_criteria: Admin dashboard overview displays Google indexing visibility stats when Search Console is configured
Backend exposes an authenticated admin endpoint for SEO visibility data
Blog publish flow pings Google sitemap without blocking publish on ping failure
New SEO-related environment variables are documented in .env.example
risk_notes: Search Console credentials or site URL misconfiguration will return unconfigured/error status
Sitemap ping relies on external network availability
rollback_plan: Revert the new SEO service and admin routes
Remove the SEO UI card and stats section from the dashboard overview
